name: Basic Blaze Craft
desc: The base fundamentals of flame craft, rarely pushing beyond creating candle-sized flames.
always:
You may always:
* Create or quench candle-sized flames and sustain such a flame without additional fuel.
* Control the shape and motion of flames up to the size of a small campfire.
* Ignite flammable materials.
push: You may mark one against your Spirit to instead have the base effect of _Novice Blaze Craft_ for a single challenge.

name: Novice Blaze Craft
desc: Flame craft specialized in nurturing and controlling flames, whether that be creating a great blaze or stopping one.
always:
You may always:
* Create or quench campfire-sized flames and sustain such a flame without any fuel.
* Control the shape and motion of flames up to the size of a bonfire.
* Ignite flammable objects.
push:
You may mark one against your Spirit to:
* Instead have the base effect of _Adept Blaze Craft_ for a singe challenge.
* Automatically add the *Mayhem* Danger when rolling _Boldly_ and using flames to solve a problem to automatically add the *Scope* Augment.

name: Basic Gale Craft
desc: The base fundamentals of gale craft, creating light breezes and minor effects.
always:
You may always:
* Create a light breeze that can knock over small objects.
* Create minor wind effects, capable of moving leaves, paper, or other similar objects.
push: You may mark one against your Spirit to instead have the base effect of _Novice Gale Craft_ for a single challenge.

name: Novice Gale Craft
desc: Wind craft specialized in powerful blasts of wind and twisting vortexes.
always:
You may always:
* Create a breeze that shifts objects and can knock a person off-balance.
* Create wind effects, capable of moving small objects in straight lines with a degree of precision.
* Provide moderate protection from high winds.
push:
You may mark one against your Spirit to:
* Instead have the base effect of _Adept Gale Craft_ for a singe challenge.
* Automatically add the *Mayhem* Danger when rolling _Boldly_ and using wind to solve a problem to automatically add the *Scope* Augment.
